page.title: 09HOME COMPUTERS
page.content:
Half the children in our class of 10 and 11 year olds at St. Georges Primary School own home computers. Two thirds of them write simple programs as well as playing games. On average they play with their computers 9 hours a week.
The favourite computer game is about football. You can play against the computer or against another person. On the screen you see a football game. You control one player at a time by pressing different keys. The second favourite game is an adventure game. You type simple commands in words to make a character go around collecting things for killing green creatures like Martians. You can get killed. Finally you confront the leader and kill him if you can.
